releases.name: v1.5.0-beta.14
releases.body:
###    üöÄ Features

- Support infer init context  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7923 [<samp>(0eec0)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/0eec06c5f)
- Auth cli  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7964 [<samp>(cf832)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/cf8322707)
- **email-otp**:
  - Support name, image and additionalFields in `/sign-in/email-otp` endpoint  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7876 [<samp>(b0a4f)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/b0a4f6c8e)
- **i18n**:
  - Pass `GenericEndpointContext` to `getLocale` callback  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7866 [<samp>(2d30e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/2d30e9c26)
- **magic-link**:
  - Add `allowedAttempts` options  -  by @Phillip9587, @himself65 and @ping-maxwell in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/5552 [<samp>(cb5ff)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/cb5ff2889)
- **oauth**:
  - Add support for legacy OAuth clients that don't use PKCE  -  by @OscarCornish, **Copilot** and @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7609 [<samp>(1e303)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/1e30369b2)
- **oauth-provider**:
  - Export oAuthState for config use  -  by @dvanmali in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7843 [<samp>(34fe5)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/34fe5f98c)
- **providers**:
  - Add Railway OAuth provider  -  by @kadumedim in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7730 [<samp>(cc65d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/cc65d9085)
- **scim**:
  - Add SCIM connection management endpoints  -  by @jonathansamines in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7898 [<samp>(4595d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/4595d12cf)
  - Introduce ownership model for SCIM  -  by @jonathansamines in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7931 [<samp>(10aa1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/10aa14d40)
- **sso**:
  - Add IdP-initiated SAML Single Logout (SLO)  -  by @Paola3stefania and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7567 [<samp>(95a5a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/95a5a6e1f)
  - Add shared redirectURI option for OIDC providers  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7818 [<samp>(a2e1d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a2e1d5fef)
- **stripe**:
  - Add seat-based billing and usage-based billing  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7930 [<samp>(dcd93)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/dcd933761)
  - Add `billingInterval` field to subscription  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7221 [<samp>(0a1dd)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/0a1dd5fbf)
- **test-utils**:
  - Add test utilities plugin for integration and E2E testing  -  by @janhesters, **Claude Opus 4.5** and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7746 [<samp>(f15d2)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f15d28bc7)

###    üêû Bug Fixes

- Standardize `name` field masking as an empty string  -  by @bytaesu, @cursoragent and **Taesu** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7794 [<samp>(dfeef)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/dfeefc4f5)
- Support all where operators in list filter endpoints  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7859 [<samp>(0a4da)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/0a4da9af3)
- Type extends  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7922 [<samp>(5d8cd)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5d8cde2eb)
- Safely coerce date values from DB in OAuth provider plugin  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7937 [<samp>(09adc)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/09adc74d8)
- Separate rate limit request and response handling  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7939 [<samp>(86ca6)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/86ca6d0b1)
- **admin**:
  - Apply listUsers filter when filterValue is defined  -  by @coderrshyam, @bytaesu and **Taesu** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7827 [<samp>(2d59c)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/2d59c928d)
- **captcha**:
  - Include error codes in middleware responses  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7991 [<samp>(6c52e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/6c52e5f6a)
- **client**:
  - Infer additional fields for top-level user and session responses  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7986 [<samp>(b857d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/b857d0342)
- **core**:
  - Coerce string where values to match field types in adapter  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7860 [<samp>(a30fc)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a30fc6d6b)
  - Exclude tsconfig.json from published package  -  by @GautamBytes and **Gautam Manchandani** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7967 [<samp>(dce7b)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/dce7bf1c0)
- **custom-session**:
  - Use getSetCookie() to preserve individual Set-Cookie headers  -  by @thomaspeklak in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7879 [<samp>(64bb8)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/64bb8b4d2)
  - Use getSetCookie() to preserve individual Set-Cookie headers "  -  by @Bekacru in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7879 [<samp>(ae30d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ae30da5de)
  - Use getSetCookie() to preserve individual Set-Cookie headers ""  -  by @Bekacru in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7879 [<samp>(6846a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/6846aec6e)
- **email-otp**:
  - Avoid user enumeration when disabled sign-up  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7971 [<samp>(a4a37)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a4a3727dd)
- **mongo-adapter**:
  - Updating a FK id should store as ObjectID  -  by @ping-maxwell in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7977 [<samp>(ad111)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ad111866c)
- **oauth**:
  - Handle `refresh_token_expires_in` in `refreshAccessToken`  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7810 [<samp>(e4a0a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/e4a0a3e01)
  - Support case-insensitive email matching for social account linking  -  by @karuppusamy-d in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7812 [<samp>(af0c8)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/af0c885a6)
- **oauth-provider**:
  - Support scope narrowing at consent submission  -  by @gustavovalverde in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7873 [<samp>(5b260)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5b2604b0b)
- **one-tap**:
  - Remove broken direct FedCM API call and harden prompt lifecycle  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7928 [<samp>(150d2)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/150d2a345)
- **organization**:
  - Remove unreachable null check in `acceptInvitation`  -  by @Saurav3004, **Taesu** and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7825 [<samp>(32d06)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/32d0682ec)
  - Refetch activeMember and activeMemberRole when active organization changes  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7989 [<samp>(7c52f)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/7c52f359b)
- **sso**:
  - Only call `provisionUser` for new users  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7870 [<samp>(a50d2)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a50d2ba0c)
  - Harden SAML ACS error redirects and add regression test for #7777  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7815 and https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7777 [<samp>(bf2b2)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/bf2b29832)
  - Use POST with body params for provider CRUD endpoints to fix client inference  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7903 [<samp>(68f70)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/68f70b7b1)
  - Resolve TXT record at verification subdomain instead of root domain  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7935 [<samp>(cc805)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/cc8051564)
- **stripe**:
  - Move meters config into plans for usage-based billing  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7946 [<samp>(9b5a7)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/9b5a78617)
  - Prevent duplicate line item when priceId equals seatPriceId  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7947 [<samp>(4fb52)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/4fb522764)
  - Remove `getSubscriptionUsage` endpoint  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7949 [<samp>(7950f)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/7950f98df)
  - Drop metered billing, use generic lineItems instead  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7951 [<samp>(04217)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/04217429c)
  - Propagate trial data in subscription webhook handlers  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7955 [<samp>(ddc27)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ddc274072)
  - Fall back to `customers.list` when `customers.search` API is unavailable  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7965 [<samp>(74e06)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/74e06e426)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/compare/v1.5.0-beta.13...v1.5.0-beta.14)

releases.name: @ai-sdk/xai@3.0.54
releases.body:
### Patch Changes

-   902e93b: Add support for `response.function_call_arguments.delta` and `response.function_call_arguments.done` streaming events in the xAI Responses API provider. Previously, xAI Grok models using function tools would fail with `AI_TypeValidationError` because these standard Responses API events were missing from the Zod schema and stream handler.

`V2.Payments.SettlementAllocationIntentSplitCreateParams.amount.currency`, and `V2.Payments.SettlementAllocationIntentUpdateParams.amount.currency` to be required

  * Add support for new value `rate_card_custom_pricing_unit_overage_rate_details` on enums `InvoiceItem.pricing.type` and `InvoiceLineItem.pricing.type`

  * Add support for `payment_behavior` on `SubscriptionResumeParams`
  * Add support for `effective_at` and `spend_modifier_rule` on `V2.Billing.IntentAction.apply`, `V2.Billing.IntentAction.remove`, `V2.Billing.IntentCreateParams.actions[].apply`, and `V2.Billing.IntentCreateParams.actions[].remove`

### ü©π Fixes

- **nuxt:** Do not start view transition if there is no route ([#33723](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/33723))

- **nuxt:** Preserve middleware error status in 404 fallback ([#34148](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34148))
- **nitro:** Do not augment `nuxt/schema` ([#34255](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34255))
- **nuxt:** Cache manifest files to preserve buildId ([#34002](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34002))
- **nuxt:** Don't decode query string in SSR context URL ([#34252](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34252))
- **nuxt:** Allow specifying moduleDependencies by `meta.name` ([#34263](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34263))
- **nuxt:** Resolve `#components` import mapping conflict for packages outside rootDir ([#34139](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34139))
- **vite,webpack:** Use node.res to send 403/404 ([#34266](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34266))
- **nitro,nuxt:** Align path encoding with vue-router ([#34265](https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/34265))

### üíÖ Refactors

releases.body:
###    üöÄ Features

- Make `name` field optional "  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7617 [<samp>(00c95)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/00c95728f)
- Electron integration  -  by @jslno and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7647 [<samp>(1c9aa)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/1c9aab3bc)
- Awaitable social provider config  -  by @dvanmali in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/4829 [<samp>(ed68d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ed68d3d3c)
- **email-otp**: Add rateLimit configuration option  -  by @ShobhitPatra and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/4005 [<samp>(001fe)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/001fe7f3f)
- **oauth-proxy**: Rewrite to support distributed environments  -  by @bytaesu, @cursoragent and **taesu** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7720 [<samp>(71a02)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/71a0297b4)

###    üêû Bug Fixes

- Improve Headers detection with instanceof check and cross-realm fallback  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7651 [<samp>(bb45c)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/bb45c2dc1)
- Correct error redirect URL construction  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7799 [<samp>(4fe37)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/4fe373184)
- **adapter**:
  - Use `getCurrentAdapter` for user lookup to avoid transaction deadlock  -  by @sakamoto-wk in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7758 [<samp>(7db4e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/7db4e6095)
- **api-key**:
  - Error details not passed to response  -  by @ping-maxwell and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7692 [<samp>(ace5a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ace5ac756)
- **cli**:
  - Add `.env.local` to dotenv  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7831 [<samp>(3b2b9)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/3b2b9834c)
- **db**:
  - Skip 'adapter.delete' in deleteWithHooks when entity not found  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7792 [<samp>(ef26e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ef26e179a)
- **email-otp**:
  - Typo in OpenAPI response metadata  -  by @smsunarto and **Claude Opus 4.5** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7737 [<samp>(be4e7)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/be4e7ee67)
- **expo**:
  - Construct the new Request to avoid immutable headers error on Cloudflare Workers  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7774 [<samp>(ecbd1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ecbd1e0b2)
  - Avoid a leading ‚Äú; ‚Äù when constructing the first cookie  -  by @Laurin-Notemann in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7821 [<samp>(a2b64)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a2b64cd99)
- **generic-oauth**:
  - Emit duplicate id warning  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7779 [<samp>(9f40c)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/9f40c35ee)
- **microsoft**:

releases.name: v20.4.0-alpha.2
releases.body:
* [#2567](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-node/pull/2567) Update generated code for private-preview
  * Add support for new resource `V2.Core.ConnectionSession`
  * Add support for `create` and `retrieve` methods on resource `V2.Core.ConnectionSession`
  * Add support for `list` method on resources `V2.Payments.SettlementAllocationIntentSplit` and `V2.Payments.SettlementAllocationIntent`
  * Add support for `agentic_commerce_settings` on `AccountSessionCreateParams.components`
  * Add support for `terminal_hardware_orders` and `terminal_hardware_shop` on `AccountSession.components` and `AccountSessionCreateParams.components`
  * Add support for `network_cost_passthrough_report` on `AccountSession.components`
  * Add support for new values `ae_bank_account`, `ag_bank_account`, `bh_bank_account`, `gm_bank_account`, `hk_bank_account`, `kh_bank_account`, `lc_bank_account`, `mc_bank_account`, `mg_bank_account`, `my_bank_account`, `qa_bank_account`, `rw_bank_account`, `th_bank_account`, `tt_bank_account`, and `vn_bank_account` on enums `V2.Account.configuration.recipient_data.default_outbound_destination.type` and `V2.Core.Account.configuration.recipient.default_outbound_destination.type`
  * Add support for `cadence_data` on `V2.Billing.IntentCreateParams` and `V2.Billing.Intent`
  * Add support for `cancellation_details` on `V2.Billing.IntentAction.deactivate`, `V2.Billing.IntentCreateParams.actions[].deactivate`, and `V2.Billing.PricingPlanSubscription`
  * Add support for `contact_phone` on `V2.Core.AccountCreateParams`, `V2.Core.AccountTokenCreateParams`, `V2.Core.AccountUpdateParams`, and `V2.Core.Account`
  * Add support for `registration_date` on `V2.Core.Account.identity.business_details`, `V2.Core.AccountCreateParams.identity.business_details`, `V2.Core.AccountTokenCreateParams.identity.business_details`, and `V2.Core.AccountUpdateParams.identity.business_details`
  * Add support for new value `gb_vat` on enums `V2.Core.Account.identity.business_details.id_numbers[].type`, `V2.Core.AccountCreateParams.identity.business_details.id_numbers[].type`, `V2.Core.AccountTokenCreateParams.identity.business_details.id_numbers[].type`, and `V2.Core.AccountUpdateParams.identity.business_details.id_numbers[].type`
  * Add support for `reference` on `V2.MoneyManagement.Adjustment`
  * Add support for `accrued_fees` on `V2.MoneyManagement.FinancialAccount`
  * Add support for `starting_balance` on `V2.MoneyManagement.FinancialAccount.payments`
  * Add support for new value `accrued_fees` on enum `V2.MoneyManagement.FinancialAccount.type`
  * Add support for `account_holder_address` and `account_holder_name` on `V2.MoneyManagement.FinancialAddress.credentials.us_bank_account`
  * Add support for `fingerprint` on `V2.MoneyManagement.PayoutMethod.card`
  * Add support for `card_spend` on `V2.MoneyManagement.ReceivedCredit` and `V2.MoneyManagement.ReceivedDebit`
  * Add support for new value `card_spend` on enum `V2.MoneyManagement.ReceivedCredit.type`
  * Add support for new value `card_spend` on enum `V2.MoneyManagement.ReceivedDebit.type`
  * Add support for new values `advance`, `anticipation_repayment`, `balance_transfer`, `charge_failure`, `charge`, `climate_order_purchase`, `climate_order_refund`, `connect_collection_transfer`, `connect_reserved_funds`, `contribution`, `dispute_reversal`, `financing_paydown_reversal`, `financing_paydown`, `inbound_transfer_reversal`, `issuing_dispute_fraud_liability_debit`, `issuing_dispute_provisional_credit_reversal`, `issuing_dispute_provisional_credit`, `issuing_dispute`, `minimum_balance_hold`, `network_cost`, `obligation`, `outbound_payment_reversal`, `outbound_transfer_reversal`, `partial_capture_reversal`, `payment_network_reserved_funds`, `platform_earning_refund`, `platform_earning`, `platform_fee`, `received_credit_reversal`, `received_debit_reversal`, `refund_failure`, `risk_reserved_funds`, `stripe_balance_payment_debit_reversal`, `stripe_balance_payment_debit`, `stripe_fee_tax`, `transfer_reversal`, and `unreconciled_customer_funds` on enums `V2.MoneyManagement.Transaction.category` and `V2.MoneyManagement.TransactionEntry.transaction_details.category`
  * Add support for `application_fee_refund`, `application_fee`, `charge`, `dispute`, `payout`, `refund`, `reserve_hold`, `reserve_release`, `topup`, `transfer_reversal`, and `transfer` on `V2.MoneyManagement.Transaction.flow` and `V2.MoneyManagement.TransactionEntry.transaction_details.flow`
  * Add support for new values `application_fee_refund`, `application_fee`, `charge`, `dispute`, `payout`, `refund`, `reserve_hold`, `reserve_release`, `topup`, `transfer_reversal`, and `transfer` on enums `V2.MoneyManagement.Transaction.flow.type` and `V2.MoneyManagement.TransactionEntry.transaction_details.flow.type`
  * Change `V2.Payments.SettlementAllocationIntentSplit.flow` to be optional
  * Add support for new value `accrued_fees` on enum `V2.MoneyManagement.FinancialAccountListParams.types`
  * Change `V2.Billing.RateCardRateCreateParams.metered_item` to be required
  * Add support for error codes `blocked_payout_method` and `unsupported_payout_method` on `BlockedByStripeError`
  * Add support for error code `invalid_payout_method_data` on `InvalidPayoutMethodError`
  * Add support for error code `limit_payout_method` on `QuotaExceededError`

See [the changelog for more details](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-node/blob/v20.4.0-alpha.2/CHANGELOG.md).

releases.name: v1.0.0-beta.14
releases.body:
## Migrator update
The `migrator` now applies all changes that are missing in the database. Previously the migrator only looked for local migrations with a creation date later than the last migration applied in the database
Now it detects and applies all missing migrations

- Fixed `generate` and `pull` commands to display the `SQL file` instead of the `folder` path in the migration output message
> Your SQL migration ‚ûú path

## Bug fixed
- [[BUG]: Cache is not invalidated after table updates](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4677)
- [[BUG]: Composite index with sort outputs a malformed SQL](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4704)
- [[BUG]: db introspection generates broken schema.ts syntax](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4582)
- [`random` property is set on `Array.prototype` with `enumerable: true`](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4484)
- [Fixed error TS7056 appearing when using "declaration": true in defineRelations with reworked PgColumns](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5272)
- [[BUG]: mssql transaction is not a function](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5328)
- [Fixed an error when seeding a composite unique column that includes a foreign key](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4354)

- Postgres: `DROP INDEX` statement did not respect schema
- Restricted usage of async functions in sync drivers' transactions
